intro: Stellaria gyirongensis, commonly known as the Gyirong starwort, is a flowering plant native to the Tibetan Plateau. It belongs to the Caryophyllaceae family and is characterized by its small, star-shaped flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky and alpine environments, showcasing its adaptability to harsh climates. Its leaves are lanceolate and often covered in fine hairs, which help reduce water loss. Stellaria gyirongensis is of interest to botanists due to its unique ecological role and potential medicinal properties.
